name: qcl
description: Quick Component Language: A universal, component-based markup language

scripts.build: tsc && npx pegjs --format commonjs src/qcl.pegjs -o src/parser.js && npx esbuild src/runtime.ts --bundle --minify --outfile=dist/runtime.js
scripts.deploy-gh-pages: npm run build && npx qcl compile examples/app.qcl --output dist --output-file index.html && npx qcl compile examples/counter.qcl --output dist --output-file counter.html && mkdir -p dist/locales && cp examples/locales/*.json dist/locales/ && cp dist/* . && gh-pages -d .
